name: EnergyBot
description:
This is a game made for the Cult of Jabrils - Stay@Home Jam.

In EnergyBot you're an old model robot fighting your way out of a complex full of new and  better versions of you.

I took some sounds from this people:

https://opengameart.org/content/laser-rifle
http://soundbible.com/1920-Minigun.html
https://opengameart.org/content/chaingun-pistol-rifle-shotgun-shots
https://opengameart.org/content/oves-essential-game-audio-pack-collection-160-fi...
